content: a hairpin lace shawl made in 5 strips with stitches around each strip give the finished shawl an unusually fancy look skill level easy hairpin lace video-tutorial 1 also at knitting daily 2 episode 507 1 https //www yarnspirations com/how-to-video-rh-20121009-learn-to-make-hairpin-lace html 2 https //www interweave com/article/crochet/womans-hairpin-lace-shawl--seeasn-on-knitting-daily-tv-episode-507/
